text: Daudi kavika ukayake Yelusalemu, Daudi kawasola waja iwatwanzi longo wakalile kamba wehe zake awo wakalile walolezi wa ng'anda yake, kaweka mwiing'anda imoja na wakalizigwa goya na kawagwaa ndiya, lakini hawasile nao, hawatogoleligwe kulawa kunze na wakala mumo kamba wagane siku zose za ugima wao.
